location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, received 1 May 1802, Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], informs Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, that the Vipernow proceeds to Bushire, on her way to the Presidency. Manesty states that the ship's Commander, Lieutenant Thomas Dade Beaty, has been directed to remain at Bushire for twenty-four hours, in order to receive the Resident's dispatches for Government.
